citations.narrative:
The room holding bulk dry food storage has an accumulation of supplies such as crates, enclosures, and enrichment
items that prevent full visualization of the floor, around food storage, and the peripheral edges of the room. It is important
that all areas where food is stored can be routinely monitored and inspected for signs of pests or other potential
contaminates of food. Correct by April 25, 2023 by ensuring all premises (buildings and grounds) are kept clean and in
good repair to facilitate the prescribed husbandry standards set forth in Subpart F.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The room holding bulk dry food storage has an accumulation of supplies such as crates, enclosures, and enrichment 
items that prevent full visualization of the floor, around food storage, and the peripheral edges of the room. It is important 
that all areas where food is stored can be routinely monitored and inspected for signs of pests or other potential 
contaminates of food. Correct by April 25, 2023 by ensuring all premises (buildings and grounds) are kept clean and in 
good repair to facilitate the prescribed husbandry standards set forth in Subpart F. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
